content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to write the updated script to a file named "octopus_tech_updated.py". The script explores the potential applications of octopus-inspired technology in the field of marine biology and defines variables. It identifies potential applications such as developing new underwater propulsion systems, creating new types of underwater sensors and cameras, and designing new types of underwater robots. The script also prints potential applications. I received a command to execute the python file "octopus_tech_updated.py".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command execute_python_file returned: Developing new underwater propulsion systems based on the way octopuses move\nCreating new types of underwater sensors and cameras that mimic the way octopuses see and sense their environment\nDesigning new types of underwater robots that can manipulate objects and move through tight spaces like octopuses can\n'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "octopus-inspired technology in marine biology"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command google returned: ["https://www.sciencenews.org/article/octopus-inspired-glove-suckers-humans-grip-slippery-objects", "https://www.theatlantic.com/science/archive/2017/10/octopus-inspired-material-can-change-its-texture/542598/", "https://www.bizjournals.com/boston/news/2022/05/05/octopus-inspired-skin-care.html", "https://www.icr.org/article/octopus-skin-inspires-high-tech-camouflage", "https://ocean.si.edu/ocean-life/invertebrates/tech-imitates-life-sneaky-sea-worm-inspires-soft-robots", "https://phys.org/news/2015-04-octopus-inspired-robotthe-fastest-underwater-robot.html", "https://scitechdaily.com/3d-printed-artificial-muscle-inspired-by-color-changing-octopus-skin/", "https://www.patternity.org/explore/index/octopus-inspired-camouflage/"]'}]
"""
